## Common mistakes

  ** Forget greetings
  
      *** e.g., 'Dear'
      
      *** Non-formal in the first email, eg. Dear Meindra (in some context, it is OK)
  
  ** Forget closing
  
     *** e.g Best wishes, Best regards, Kind regards, Warm regards
  
  *** Forget mentioning your name as a sender
  
  Best wishes,
  
  *** Giving a command instead of polite request
